page.title: 20Clubs in the Maylands
page.content: {A very active community}with clubs for all ages and interests.{The sporting clubs are many and vsried. Maylandsea Bay yacht club has large premises on the front and Harlow Boys have a sailing club nearby. There are 2 {football clubs}and clubs for snooker, table tennis, karate and judo, darts, ladies keep fit and wild fowlers. {Educational clubs}include 2 play groups & a scout & guide group. This is a very active group which have raised enough money for their own premises. There are Beaver, Cub, Sea and Venture Scouts with Brownies and Guides. Pathfinders and Explorer clubs run by the Church for boys and girls. On the{social side clubs are grouped by age or sex- mother & toddler, Woman's Own, W.I., Happy Circle, and Seniors.{Peacemakers}are a charity fund raising group.
